Dec. 2, 2012 D Scottish Challenge Shield
Scottish Challenge Shield 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Scottish BBA Festival of Brass scottish-challenge-shield
3 Separate Adjudicator Boxes (Test Piece)
Perth Concert Hall, Perth, Perth & Kinross, Scotland, UK Adj A: Stephen Roberts Adj B: John Doyle Adj C: Archie Hutchison (tie-breaker)
Best 1st Section Band - Newmilns & Galston Best 2nd Section Band - Tullis Russell Mills
Dec. 5, 2012, 6:46 p.m. Nov. 25, 2013, 11:09 p.m.
1 Newmilns and Galston Band Nigel Boddice Chivalry
2 Tullis Russell Mills Martyn Ramsay Music for the Common Man
3 Clackmannan and District Band Paul McKelvie The Essence of Time
4 Johnstone Band Paul Kiernan The Year of the Dragon
5 Irvine and Dreghorn Band John Boax Oceans
6 Granite City Brass Alan Haggart Trittico
7 Shotts St Patrick's Brass Michael Marzella The Accursed Huntsman
8 Coalburn Silver Band Gareth Bowman Spectrum [Vinter]
9 Croy Silver Band Kenneth Blackwood Academic Festival Overture
Withdrawn Dalkeith and Monktonhall Band Jim Chamberlain
